transform_id.description: The id of the transform for which to get stats. '_all' or '*' implies all transforms

from.description: skips a number of transform stats, defaults to 0

size.description: specifies a max number of transform stats to get, defaults to 100

timeout.description: Controls the time to wait for the stats

allow_no_match.description: Whether to ignore if a wildcard expression matches no transforms. (This includes `_all` string or when no transforms have been specified)
